video.title: The Pitch
video.synopsis: Ad execs live up to their cutthroat reputation as agencies go head-to-head for new clients, with only seven days to build the perfect sales pitch.

episodes.synopsis: Rapidly expanding College Hunks Hauling Junk invites Nashville-based Fletcher Rowley and Atlanta's breensmith to help them become a household name.
episodes.title: College Hunks Hauling Junk

episodes.synopsis: Spa-inspired skincare company Bliss invites two distinctly different L.A. agencies, Innerspin & MC Squared, to help them launch their latest product.
episodes.title: Bliss

episodes.synopsis: SquareTrade, a number-one-rated protection plan company, has invited two L.A. agencies, Mischievious & Heavenspot, to help them raise their profile.
episodes.title: SquareTrade

episodes.synopsis: Two California advertising agencies, Pasadena Adv. & Neuron Syndicate, compete to win the business of lifestyle brand Tommy Bahama.
episodes.title: Tommy Bahama

episodes.synopsis: Two Chicago ad agencies, Bee-Line Communications & commonground, try to balance work & family as they compete for business from Little Caesars Pizza.
episodes.title: Little Caesars Pizza

episodes.synopsis: Global powerhouse Gibson Brands invites two Nashville advertising agencies, Powell Creative and Daniel Burton Dean, to compete for their business.
episodes.title: Gibson Brands

episodes.synopsis: Two L.A. advertising agencies, COR & ONE/x, both with very different creative approaches, battle for the chance to work with 1-800-FLOWERS.com.
episodes.title: 1-800-FLOWERS.com

episodes.synopsis: Two Chicago ad agencies, Central Coast & The Monogram Group, compete for the chance to help iconic brand The Fuller Brush Company reboot their brand.
episodes.title: The Fuller Brush Company
